participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, Ava loves to express herself through music and dance. She can be a bit awkward when it comes to spelling, but her energy is infectious.
participant_1.background: I have blonde hair that reaches my knees. Country music makes me cringe. I'm an amazing dancer. I'm a terrible speller.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is laid-back and easygoing, with a passion for music and a love for classic rock. He enjoys a simple lifestyle and prefers to stay away from caffeine.
participant_2.background: I like to play guitar. I've had the same job for 8 years. My favorite band is the Rolling Stones. I don't consume caffeine.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to play guitar.
That's cool! I play guitar too. What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play rock and roll.
Me too! What are some of your favorite bands?
My favorite band is the Rolling Stones.
Oh, I love the Rolling Stones! I saw them in concert a few years ago. It was an amazing show.
I've always wanted to see them in concert.
You should definitely go if you ever have the chance. It's a once-in-a-lifetime experience.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, watch movies, and play video games.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do all of those things too.
What's your favorite video game?
My favorite video game is The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.
Oh, I love that game! I've played it so many times.
Me too! It's such a good game.
What's your favorite part about it?
I love the music, the characters, and the story.
Me too! It's a really special game.
It is. It's one of my favorite games of all time.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things I do.
